Aacademic CV

title: Milan Wiedemann
text:
Iâ€™m a researcher at the Bennett Institute for Applied Data Science at the University of Oxford. I enjoy developing tools that make it easier and more fun to work with clinical data:

suddengains and lcsm are R packages that my colleagues and I developed to understand changes in clinical measures during psychological therapy
ehrQL is a query language written in Python that our team designed to make it easy to work with electronic health records

My work involves using these tools to study changes in clinical measures during psychological therapies 1 2 and to evaluate the quality of clinical care using electronic health records 3.
